QuestionName: Who are our key customers?
What are their characteristics, needs, and preferences?
What problems do they want to solve?
How can we categorize and prioritize different customer segments?
What value do we offer to our customers?
What problems are we solving for them?
What needs are we satisfying?
What makes our product or service unique and attractive?
Through which channels do we reach our customers?
How do we deliver our value proposition to customers?
Which channels are most effective and efficient for our business?
What kind of relationship do we establish with our customers?
How do we acquire, retain, and grow our customer base?
What level of customer support or service do we provide?
How do we make money? What is our pricing strategy?
What are the different revenue sources for our business?
Are there various pricing models or revenue streams to consider?
What resources (assets, people, technology) are essential to our business model?
What are the key factors that enable us to create and deliver value?
What partnerships or supplier relationships do we rely on?
What are the most critical activities in our business model?
What do we need to excel at to deliver our value proposition?
Are there unique processes or activities that give us a competitive advantage?
Who are our key partners or collaborators?
What are the reasons for forming these partnerships?
How do these partnerships strengthen our business model?
What are the major costs and expenses associated with our business model?
What are the fixed and variable costs?
How can we optimize our cost structure?
